name: Umbilical
description:
Made for Lost Relic Games Game Jam
Theme: Connection

In this 2.5d platformer game, two (or one) players are connected by an umbilical cord and must work together to solve puzzles.

They can't travel too far from each other, or the cord will become stretched and taut, making it difficult to move around. The players must coordinate in order to progress through the game. 

This unique twist on the platformer genre requires players to think outside the box in order to succeed.

WebGL available for those who refuse to download the games, Desktop version also available. Desktop version runs much better.

Controls:
Move: P1(A and D), P2(Left and Right Arrow Keys)
Jump: P1(W), P2(Up Arrow Key)
Pull Partner: P1(Q), P2(Right Ctrl)
Interact: P1(E), P2(Down Arrow Key)
